transArray.content: Being so lazy, I wrote a review for the first time because it is so good and the service is good, especially the little brother at the front desk is super nice. He took the initiative to introduce the travel guide and offered to renew the room at a low price! The room is also very tidy, there is a free supper at night, and the breakfast has many types and is replenished in a timely manner. It would be perfect if the room was bigger
